title: Hammerin' Hokies back Hackenberg's mastery in 17-1 win - VT hokiesports.com
content: Hammerin' Hokies back Hackenberg's mastery in 17-1 win  VT hokiesports.com
description: Receiving a top-to-bottom effort behind freshman Drue Hackenberg's masterful seven innings of work on Sunday, the Virginia Tech baseball team thumped Wright State, 17-1, to clinch the teams' three-game series at English Field at Atlantic Union Bank Park.
